text: was a Japanese architect and writer. His major works were Kyōto Station, the Umeda Sky Building in Osaka, the Yamato International building in Tokyo and the Sapporo Dome in Hokkaidō. He was a professor at the University of Tokyo until 1997. Hara died on 3 January 2025, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Japanese architects
